While our allies are filling petitions banning him from setting foot on their soil, Putin praises him. If that's not a huge warning I don't know what is. Many in our nation are engaged in shortsighted vindictive politics. They're entertaining Trump like they would a fling; short term satisfaction with the potential for long term misery! If people weren't so acclimated to trash tv and reality raunch, perhaps they'd actually be able to use their brains and see that Carson has true wisdom and fierce compassion where all are concerned. He has the precision and level headed control to remove a cancer like ISIS from any region of the planet and all while weighing every benefit and risk along the way. Carson is clearly the only grownup on the Republican stage!

They can also forgive the fine if he stops being a rebellious jerk, advocating against HOA's... When I sold real estate in Mo. It was required buyers were to receive, read and sign off on rules and regulations in the properties HOA's. Now live in Ks. where I had to request a copy! It's the buyers responsibility to make themselves aware, AND to attend yearly meetings when finance and new regulations are voted on. Go live in the country with your 10 dogs chained up in your yard next to your broken down RV, and throw drunken parties half the night. Heck grow pot in the common ground and paint your house purple! Won't be happening in my HOA Governed neighborhood. FYI... houses sell within thirty days on the market, if they make it to market unless they are overpriced. I commend our HOA board members. A thankless job done by volunteers.
